message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. It's a great deal, and I believe it's worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $1,300,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but $1,350,000 is my final offer. Let's make this happen!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with $1,325,000 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
